Yuriy Plyska

Brno, Czech Republic · (+420) 721-074-949 · yuriyply@gmail.com

Proactive .NET developer with 2.5 years of experience in .NET back-end positions. Proficient in a variety of .NET technologies, AQA tasks, and creating test cases. Strong software engineering background, and a solid foundation in algorithms. In addition, I hold a degree in electronics, and I have extensive experience in debugging and fixing electronic goods. As a Test Engineer at Jabil, I have set up different test stations, developed maintenance plans, sourced spare parts, written test programs for PCBs on Flying Probe, communicated with customers, and developed test scripts for electrical products. Driven by a passion for software development, I am focused on leveraging my diverse technical experience and adaptability to contribute meaningfully to my team and projects while constantly seeking opportunities to further develop my skills in the software development industry.. Temporarily work as a process engineer, I have also completed the Czech A1 course and am continuing to study actively
